name: Offroad G63
description:
Driving simulator of a luxury 4x4 and 6x6 SUV with the effects of real physics and damage effects.
Now you can drive 4x4 or 6x6, drift and feel like on a real expensive Gelik (G Class).

There are 4 modes in the game

1. City - In city mode, you become a participant in road traffic.
2. Forest - Off-road mode in the forest.
3. Desert - Off-road mode in sand deserts .-
4. Stunt - 30 levels

GAME FEATURES

- Damage the car.
- Full tuning system.
- Beautiful 3D graphics.
- 3 different camera settings.
